column1: The name is [[Sindarin]] and means "forest of the great fear".<ref>{{App|Translation}}</ref> ''[[taur]]'' means "forest"<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}

column2: the latter word was given the form ''Dae'''dh'''elos'' (with [[lenition|lenited]] ''-delos'') and glossed as "Shadow of Abomination".<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}

column4: referring to a land of [[Tol Eressea]] known as [[Heath of the Sky-roof]]. It was the site of a great battle
column5: and afterwards was known as [[Withered Heath]].<ref>{{LT2|VI}}</ref>
